xmlText.p: First Period_1, Vancouver, Del Zotto 5 (Baertschi, Horvat), 0:37. 2, Florida, Dadonov 14 (Bjugstad, Barkov), 7:36. 3, Vancouver, Horvat 14 (Baertschi), 8:10. 4, Florida, McGinn 8 (Ekblad, Malgin), 13:01 (pp). 5, Florida, Petrovic 1 (McCann), 17:25. 6, Florida, Bjugstad 10 (Barkov), 18:36. Goalies_Florida, Reimer 14-12-5 (37 shots-34 saves). Vancouver, Nilsson 6-9-1 (20-20), Markstrom 16-19-5 (14-10).
